flavorText: A skilled ranger can glance at the mud on your boots and tell where you last camped.

foreignData.flavorText: Ein guter Waldläufer kann an dem Schmutz an Deinen Stiefeln ablesen, wo Du zuletzt gezeltet hast.
foreignData.name: Aufrührerischer Waldläufer
foreignData.text: {G}, {T}: Bringe ein Standardland aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Un bon ranger peut regarder la boue de vos bottes et dire d'où vous venez.
foreignData.name: Ranger renégat
foreignData.text: {G}, {T}: Mettez en jeu une carte de terrain de base de votre main.

foreignData.name: 精力的なレインジャー

name: Firebrand Ranger
originalText:
o
G, oc
T: Put a basic land card from your hand into play.

rulings.text: This does not count as your one land you can normally play each turn.
Putting the card onto the battlefield is optional. When the ability resolves, you can choose not to.

text: {G}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
